thread.title: Scouting For Girls play free gig in Southampton today
thread.title_full: Scouting For Girls play free gig in Southampton today

title: Scouting For Girls play free gig in Southampton today
text:
1 comment 
MUSIC lovers will be in for a treat today as Scouting For Girls play a free gig at Southampton ’s HMV store. 
Performing live and signing copies of their new album Still Thinking About You, fans can catch them in store at 12pm. 
A return to the immaculate pop of their triple-platinum number one debut album but with a fresh, more mature sound, the album includes Christmas In The Air (Tonight), a seasonal smash in waiting. Share article 
Frontman Roy Stride called it the ultimate Scouting For Girls record. 
The pop rockers, who formed in 2005, have been nominated for four Brit Awards and one Ivor Novello Award. They are best known for the hits She’s So Lovely and Elvis Ain’t Dead.
